meta.article_title: March 21, 2012 - Forehand Deception with Shoulder Rotation

forehand-deception-with-shoulder-rotatio.probleme: Proper shoulder rotation for forehand deception

debutant.nom: Fake crosscourt then go down the line
debutant.description: Line up shoulders for crosscourt, hesitate briefly, and then hit down the line.

debutant.nom: Fake down the line then go crosscourt
debutant.description: Line up shoulders for down-the-line shot, hesitate briefly, and then hit crosscourt.

intermediaire.nom: Fake down the line from backhand side and go crosscourt
intermediaire.description: Line up shoulders to hit down the line, then rotate forward more during the forward swing to hit crosscourt.

intermediaire.nom: Fake crosscourt from forehand side and go down the line
intermediaire.description: Line up shoulders to hit crosscourt, then rotate back more during the forward swing to hit down the line.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Fake down the line from backhand side and go crosscourt
exercices_complementaires.description: Line up shoulders to hit down the line, then rotate forward more during the forward swing to hit crosscourt.

metriques_progression.description: Practice timing the last-second shoulder rotation for a smooth transition between shots.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Avoid over-rotating the shoulders, as this can make it difficult to control the shot.
